items.title: [Video-Ocean Agent](https://video-ocean.com/en/agent) Online

items.title: Ph.D. Graduated

items.title: [Open-Sora 2.0](https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.09642) [![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/hpcaitech/Open-Sora?style=social)](https://github.com/hpcaitech/Open-Sora) Released!
items.content: üöÄ Despite constrained computational resources, it achieves Sora-level metrics, fulfilling our goal of providing an open-source implementation of Sora.

items.title: Instruction in the Wild [![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/XueFuzhao/InstructionWild?style=social)](https://github.com/XueFuzhao/InstructionWild)
items.description: This project focuses on building a larger and more diverse instruction dataset by collecting 110K instructions from shared ChatGPT usage.

items.title: Token-Crisis
items.description: The available data can no longer keep pace with LLM development, but a carefully designed data repetition strategy can partially mitigate this limitation.
items.authors: **Authors:** Fuzhao Xue, Yao Fu, Wangchunshu Zhou, **Zangwei Zheng**, Yang You

items.title: Zero-Shot Continual Learning
items.description: A new benchmark and method to mitigate forgetting problem existed in the continual learning of large pretrained vision-language models.
items.authors: **Authors:** **Zangwei Zheng**, Mingyuan Ma, Kai Wang, Ziheng Qin, Xiangyu Yue, Yang You

items.title: DoPrompt for Domain Adaptation
items.description: DoPrompt is a simple and effective method to improve the performance of domain adaptation by using prompts.
items.authors: **Authors:** **Zangwei Zheng**, Xiangyu Yue, Kai Wang, Yang You

items.title: PCS Learning
items.description: An end-to-end Prototypical Cross-domain Self-Supervised Learning (PCS) framework for Few-shot Unsupervised Domain Adaptation (FUDA).
items.authors: **Authors:** Xiangyu Yue, **Zangwei Zheng** (co-first-author), Shanghang Zhang, Yang Gao, Trevor Darrell, Kurt Keutzer, Alberto Sangiovanni Vincentelli

items.title: Research Intern
items.description: Work on large batch training for click-through rate prediction model, mentored by Xuan Zhou and Youlong Cheng.

items.title: Research Intern
items.description: Work on self-supervised learning and domain adaptation, mentored by Xiangyu Yue and Alberto Sangiovanni-Vincentelli.
